labels.name: reserved-for-beginners
labels.description: Issues reserved for people who haven't committed before

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

body: @Jeetu95 are you working on this? This involves a few subtle changes, so if you're not, I'll open a quick PR.
Yes @ayush1999, I am working on this

I'm adding some rules to the README.md to avoid conflicts. PRs with `reserved-for-beginners` label will be reserved to people who have never committed in the project before. Every issue is to be considered as being unassigned until there is a PR linked to it.

issue.title: Code formatting of f-strings and set declaration

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
Worked on issues #82  and #81.
 - Changed necessary conversions of lists into sets. #82 
 - Used f-strings everywhere where format() function was used. #81 

@marco-c  Please take a look.
Thank you
